import pandas as pd

import os
os.system(‘curl -C - -o transactions.parquet <URL_TO_DATASET>’)

df = pd.read_parquet(‘flights.parquet’)

posts.name: Rishit Pant
posts.cooked:
Run this on google colab.

!curl --location --continue-at - --output flights.parquet "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/u/0/uc?id=1b6NmkCS4vTZBHbOlP9vPxIjmbitVDn4b&export=download"

When you click on download button in the google drive, you get redirected to this kind of link. Copy paste that link in here before running (just in case datasets are different for everyone.)
